error.message: Call to deprecated function handy_cache_tags_get_entity_tags(): Try to not use this, since its procedural. Use \Drupal::service('handy_cache_tags.manager')->getEntityTags() instead.
Call to deprecated function handy_cache_tags_get_tag(): Try to not use this, since its procedural. Use \Drupal::service('handy_cache_tags.manager')->getTag() instead.

Call to deprecated function handy_cache_tags_get_bundle_tag_from_entity(): Try to not use this, since its procedural. Use \Drupal::service('handy_cache_tags.manager')->getBundleTagFromEntity() instead.
Call to deprecated function handy_cache_tags_get_bundle_tag(): Try to not use this, since its procedural. Use \Drupal::service('handy_cache_tags.manager')->getBundleTag() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to handy_cache_tags.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
A drupal/core requirement is not present in composer.json. Having a composer.json is not a requirement for Drupal 9 compatibility but if there is one, it should include a drupal/core requirement.
